body: I found this since the week has started and i keep seeing this Enderdragon everywhere on Nebula and on Nexus why is this happening Are the Dragons trying to play with us 2?
body_tagged: I found this since the week has started and i keep seeing this Enderdragon everywhere on Nebula and on Nexus why is this happening Are the Dragons trying to play with us 2?
title: Umm Fus RO Da??

replies.body: It's a glitch that came with the new update that came out yesterday.

replies.body:
It would be good if the ender dragon interrupted games randomly, or if a stalemate occurred? It would cause utter chaos for both teams xD

..and add an interesting twist to games..

hmm... that doesn't sound like a bad idea.

replies.body:
Yeah, he probably wants to play.

I think the real reason is that the top bar with "Time Remaining" is actually the Enderdragon's health bar. The Enderdragons name is set to "Time Remaining: [Time]" every tick I would presume, thus giving you a countdown bar.
